name: The Light Within Beta Release
description:
Please keep in mind the game is unfinished. I'm not active on Itch.io so the releases on here may not be as up to date as the ones on https://gamejolt.com/dashboard/games/472423

If you want to help with the game please contact me on discord: Adsnipers#6231

the game is currently not in development but i plan to come back to it once i have learned more about game development. this is my first ever published game so expect jank

All light in the world has been sucked away by a strange force, the only light left in the world is the light coming from inside of you.. and that strange white glow through the door. 

Complete the puzzles and make it through the rooms to discover where the light is coming from.
